choices.a: Rename the A::hello() method to a different name using A::hello as helloA;
choices.b: Use B::hello() instead of A 's version using B::hello insteadof A
choices.c: Use B::hello() instead of A 's version using use B::hello
choices.d: Rename the A::hello() method to a different name using A::hello renameto helloA;
choices.e: None of the above (both can be used directly)
